subject: Concussions
Football
Suits and Litigation
lead_paragraph: Nearly a dozen former N.F.L. players living in Louisiana have sued the league, the latest players to accuse it of failing to protect players from the risks associated with concussions.
snippet: Nearly a dozen former N.F.L. players living in Louisiana have sued the league, the latest players to accuse it of failing to protect players from the risks associated with concussions.
